'''Orb of the Blue Depths''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained by defeating [[Shadowy Husks]] in [[The Chasm: Underground Mines]]. There are nine orbs in total. These items are used in the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[Locked Gate in the Nameless Ruins]]''.
